sections.name: Leiko
sections.text: This creature did not include a description.

traits.name: Shadow
traits.text:
Magic with this trait involves shadows or the energy of the Netherworld.  
  
 Planes with this trait are umbral with murky light. In the Netherworld, the radius of all light from light sources and the areas of light spells are halved.

interaction_abilities.name: Shadow Shift
interaction_abilities.text: Being made partially of shadow herself, Leikois concealed in dim light or darkness even to creatures that can see clearly in those light levels.

reactive_abilities.name: Counterattack
reactive_abilities.trigger: Leiko is targeted by an attack from an adjacent creature that misses due to Leiko being concealed

reactive_abilities.name: Slip
reactive_abilities.trigger: A creature moves adjacent to Leiko
reactive_abilities.effect: Leiko teleports to a clear space adjacent to another creature she can see within 30 feet.

automatic_abilities.name: Requirements
automatic_abilities.effect: Leiko makes a Strike against the attacker.
automatic_abilities.text: Leiko is aware of the attack;

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

traits.name: Versatile
traits.text: A versatile weapon can be used to deal a different type of damage than its listed type. This trait indicates the alternate damage type. For instance, a piercing weapon with versatile S can deal piercing or slashing damage. You choose the damage type each time you attack.

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

traits.name: Thrown
traits.text: You can throw this weapon as a ranged attack; it is a ranged weapon when thrown. You add your Strength modifier to damage as you would for a melee weapon. When this trait appears on a melee weapon, it also includes the range increment. Ranged weapons with this trait use the range increment in the weapon’s Range entry.

traits.name: Versatile
traits.text: A versatile weapon can be used to deal a different type of damage than its listed type. This trait indicates the alternate damage type. For instance, a piercing weapon with versatile S can deal piercing or slashing damage. You choose the damage type each time you attack.

ability.name: Bide
ability.text: Leiko prepares to take action against her foes, watching her opponent and waiting for the right opportunity to respond. Leiko gains a second reaction until the start of her next turn, though she still can't use more than one reaction on the same triggering action.

ability.name: Tenebral Form
ability.text: Leiko can Fly at full Speed in gaseous form.
